alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ware, northeastern Clinch and western Charlton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and thunderstorms centered 11 miles southeast of Manor, or 13 miles northwest of Stephen Foster State Park, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Argyle, Cogdell, Manor and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
